template.name: formap PARENT_TABLE WHILE pop C-STYLE iter
template.value:
next_vertex = start_vertex while next_parent := $d0$.get(next_vertex): # get=None if absent if next_vertex == next_parent: return next_parent next_vertex = next_parent
$END$

template.name: formap PARENT_TABLE WHILE pop C-STYLE pop
template.value:
result=[] next_vertex = start_vertex result += start_vertex while next_vertex := $d0$.pop(next_vertex, None): result += next_vertex
$END$

formap WHILE POP C-STYLE _SUPER_
fun graph undirected DRAW
template.value:
import networkx as nx import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
def draw_graph(): G = nx.Graph() G.add_node("A") G.add_node("B") G.add_node("C") G.add_node("D") G.add_node("E") G.add_node("F") G.add_node("G") G.add_edge("A", "B") G.add_edge("B", "C") G.add_edge("C", "E") G.add_edge("C", "F") G.add_edge("D", "E") G.add_edge("F", "G") plt.figure(figsize=(8, 8)) nx.draw(G)
draw_graph()

template.name: fun graphic functions DRAW
template.value:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from math import *
F1 = [x ** 0.5 for x in range(1, 100)] F2 = [2 ** (log(x)) for x in range(1, 100)] F3 = [x ** (5/3) for x in range(1, 100)]
fig, ax = plt.subplots() ax.plot(F1,color='black') ax.plot(F2,color='red') ax.plot(F3) plt.show()

template.name: fun graphic functions DRAW POINTS
template.value:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from math import *
P = [(2, 3), (12, 30), (40, 50), (5, 1), (2, 10), (3, 4)]
# Draw point based on above x, y axis values. plt.scatter([x for x, y in P], [y for x, y in P], s=10) for i, (x,y) in enumerate(P): plt.annotate(f"{x},{y}", (P[i][0], P[i][1])) plt.show()

template.name: func FILE read 1val
template.value:
def file_to_array(filename): result = [] for line in open(filename): str=line.strip() if not str: continue num=int(str) assert isinstance(num,int), f"NUM={num}" result.append(num) print("Integers readed:",len(result) ) return result
ARR4 = file_to_array(r'C:\Users\trans\Downloads\IntegerArray.txt') print("ARR4>>",ARR4[:3])

template.name: func FILE read 2val
template.value:
def $file_to_array$(filename): result = [] skip_first=True for line in open(filename): str = line.strip() if not str: continue
if skip_first: skip_first=False; continue w_, l_ = str.strip().split(" ") w, l = int(w_.strip()), int(l_.strip()) assert isinstance(w, int), f"NUM1={w}" assert isinstance(l, int), f"NUM2={l}" result.append((w,l)) print("Integers readed:", len(result)) return result
arr = $file_to_array$(r'C:\Users\trans\Downloads\IntegerArray.txt') print("ARR4>>",arr)
